channel.title: I need help
channel.description:
ok well there's 2 things i want to do with my server right now, but i can't seem to find out how to do it.
first thing is to make people keep all of their items when they die, (if possible, only when killed by another player) (this is because im sick of people b****ing about looters ) i've tried do delete all of the deleteitems from the applydead and the youdied voids in client.java
second thing i want to do is to make certain weapons and armor only equipable by a certain player right. for example: a weapon intended for the admins would only be equipable for people who have admin priveleges or higher, but not lower. i have no idea where to start with this, so i havent tried anything yet. can anyone help?

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @ill4ev ill4ev
item.description:
@ill4ev wrote:

thanks i got it to work

now i just need to find out how to restrict some weapons.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @This_is_not_an_Alt_P This is not an Alt :P
item.description:
@This_is_not_an_Alt_P wrote:

did u try searching for and deleting

removeAllItems();

in client.java, player.java, or server.java
where i would look

Read full topic
